mapper.select: SELECT USERID, NAME, EMAIL, ADDRESS, MOBILENO, DEPTNO, ROLEID, LAST_LOGIN as LASTLOGIN FROM MSHOP_LOGIN_USER WHERE USERID=#{USERID} AND PASSWD=#{PASSWD} AND STATUS='0'

SELECT R.ROLE_ID, R.ROLE_NAME, A.AUTH_ID, A.AUTH_NAME, A.MENU_ID, A.URL_STATUS, A.MODULE_ID, A.URL FROM MSHOP_LOGIN_ROLE R, MSHOP_ROLE_AUTH P, MSHOP_LOGIN_AUTHORIZATION A WHERE P.STATUS='0' AND R.STATUS='0' AND R.ROLE_ID=P.ROLE_ID AND P.AUTH_ID=A.AUTH_ID AND P.ROLE_ID=#{roleId}
mapper.update: update mshop_login_user set last_login=sysdate where userid=#{userid}
mapper.select: SELECT M.MENU_ID AS menuId, MENU_CLASS AS menuClass, MENU_NAME AS menuName FROM MSHOP_COMMON_MENU M WHERE M.MODULE_ID=#{moduleId} AND M.MENU_STATUS='0' AND M.MENU_CLASS='0' AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM MSHOP_ROLE_AUTH AU, MSHOP_LOGIN_AUTHORIZATION AN WHERE AU.AUTH_ID=AN.AUTH_ID AND M.MENU_ID=AN.MENU_ID AND AU.ROLE_ID=#{roleId}) ORDER BY MENU_SORT

SELECT M.MENU_ID AS menuId, MENU_URL AS menuUrl, MENU_CLASS AS menuClass, MENU_NAME AS menuName FROM MSHOP_COMMON_MENU M WHERE M.FATHER_MENU=#{MENU_ID} AND M.MENU_STATUS='0' AND M.MENU_CLASS='1' AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM MSHOP_ROLE_AUTH AU, MSHOP_LOGIN_AUTHORIZATION AN WHERE AU.AUTH_ID=AN.AUTH_ID AND M.MENU_ID=AN.MENU_ID AND AU.ROLE_ID='1001') ORDER BY MENU_SORT

SELECT M.MENU_ID, M.MENU_NAME FROM MSHOP_COMMON_MENU M WHERE M.MODULE_ID=${moduleId} AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM MSHOP_ROLE_AUTH AU, MSHOP_LOGIN_AUTHORIZATION AN WHERE AU.AUTH_ID=AN.AUTH_ID AND M.MENU_ID=AN.MENU_ID AND AU.ROLE_ID=${roleId}) START WITH FATHER_MENU IS NULL CONNECT BY PRIOR MENU_ID=FATHER_MENU
